p: As can be seen, fish oil is the most used oil in both micro and nanoencapsulation. It is a source of unsaturated and PUFA. Humans can produce the majority of fatty acids. Nevertheless, omega-6 (n-6) and omega-3 (n-3) fatty acids, which are essential in human nutrition, cannot be synthetized by the human organism. Thus, humans have to acquire them from food. The intake of vegetable oils (edible oils), including PUFA, is related to a low incidence of chronicle diseases, such as cardiovascular or neurological disorders, and a decrease in cancer rates [ 3, 69].
